text: Aberdeen Grammar School is one of the twelve secondary schools run by the government in the City of Aberdeen, Scotland. It is run by the Aberdeen City Council education department. It is the oldest school in the city. It is around 750 years old. Lord Byron went to the Aberdeen Grammar School. A statue of him has been placed in front of the school. Category:Buildings and structures in Aberdeen Category:Grammar schools in the United Kingdom Category:Schools in Scotland
title: Aberdeen Grammar School
